content: **crocheted star christmas decoration in drops belle theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern vs-079 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx width = 10 cm length = 14 cm with strap **materials** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 03 light beige 1 star weighs approx 8 g crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 20 treble crochets in width and 10 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
